summary.span: 提供多个主体存储区上用户、计算机和组安全主体的统一访问和操作：Active Directory 域服务 (AD DS)、Active Directory 轻型目录服务 (AD LDS) 和计算机 SAM (MSAM)。

span.span: Provides uniform access and manipulation of user, computer, and group security principals across the multiple principal stores: Active Directory Domain Services (AD DS), Active Directory Lightweight Directory Services (AD LDS), and Machine SAM (MSAM).

summary.span: 管理独立于 命名空间的目录对象。

span.span: manages directory objects independent of the namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 托管目录服务应用程序可以利用 API 来简化对用户、计算机和组主体的管理。Managed directory services applications can take advantage of the API to simplify management of user, computer and group principals. 以前需要对存储区或冗长的代码（例如查找用户所属的所有组）进行复杂了解的解决方案是通过 API 的几行代码来完成的 。Solutions that previously required intricate knowledge of the store or lengthy code, such as finding all groups to which a user belongs, are accomplished in a few lines of code with the API. API 上提供了以下功能 ：The following features are available on the API: - 简化了基本目录操作，如创建和更新安全主体。Basic directory operations such as creating and updating security principals is simplified. 应用程序需要更少的基础存储来执行这些操作。The application requires less knowledge of the underlying stores to perform these operations. - 应用程序可以扩展对象模型，以包含新的目录对象类型。Applications can extend the object model to include new types of directory objects. - 简化了帐户管理任务，例如启用和禁用用户帐户。Account management tasks, such as enabling and disabling a user account, are simplified. - 跨存储支持允许 Active Directory 域服务 (中的组对象 AD DS) 、Active Directory 轻型目录服务 (AD LDS) 和计算机 SAM (数据库中包含不同类型的存储的成员。Cross-store support allows group objects in the Active Directory Domain Services (AD DS), Active Directory Lightweight Directory Services (AD LDS), and Machine SAM (MSAM) databases to contain members from different types of stores. - 按示例搜索（在类上可用 ）使应用程序能够设置主体对象的属性，并在所选存储中搜索包含匹配属性值的其他对象。Query by example searching, available on the class, enables applications to set properties on a principal object and search the selected store for other objects that contain matching property values. - 增强了计算机、用户和组主体对象的搜索功能，使应用程序能够在所选存储中搜索匹配的主体对象。Enhanced search on computer, user and group principal objects enables applications to search the selected store for matching principal objects. - 可在组主体对象上使用递归搜索，使应用程序能够以递归方式搜索组，并仅返回属于叶节点的主体对象。Recursive search, available on the group principal object, enables applications to search a group recursively and return only principal objects that are leaf nodes. - 简化了对计算机 SAM、AD DS 和 AD LS 存储区的凭据验证。Credential validation against the Machine SAM, AD DS, and AD LS stores is simplified. - 通过使用快速并发绑定 (FSB) 功能（如果可用），可以提高连接速度。Connections speeds are increased by using the Fast Concurrent Bind (FSB) feature when available. 连接缓存减少了使用的端口数。Connection caching decreases the number of ports used.
